Plot Venn Diagram of Diagnoses by Source

plot_diagnoses_src.Rd

Creates a Venn diagram showing overlaps between diagnosis sources. Optionally selects only the first source per ID or one per ID per source.

Usage

plot_diagnoses_src(data, per_source = FALSE)

Arguments

data

data.frame. The dataset containing diagnosis records with at least columns ID, SRC, and DATE. You can get this with function 'search_diagnoses()'

per_source

logical. If FALSE (default), uses only the first source per ID. If TRUE, includes one record per source per ID.

Value

A ggplot object with a Venn diagram.
